description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 6 July 2017 (RN 17/03700/FULL) for the Addition of a mansard roof extension and associated alterations to the mews property; excavation to create a new basement level with swimming pool below mews house and part rear of main house, erection of rear infill extensions at lower ground and ground floor level, erection of rear extensions at first and second floor level, and a roof access enclosure at main roof level, creation of terraces at first and main roof level, mechanical plant, and associated external alterations in connection with the use as a single family dwellinghouse (site includes 24 Eaton Mews North). NAMELY, to vary the approved drawing numbers to change the layout at lower ground, ground and first floor levels and omit windows in closet wing.
